description: Metadata information for multiplexed immunohistochemical consecutive staining on single slide.

cimac_particpant_id.description: Participant identifier assigned by the CIMAC-CIDC Network. Example: CIMAC-1234.

cimac_sample_id.description: Specimen identifier assigned by the CIMAC-CIDC Network. Example: CIMAC-12453.

exported_data_folder.description: Path to a file on a users computer

imaging_date.description: Date on which imaging experiment was analyzed.

internal_slide_id.description: Identification number used for internal imaging slide.

project_qupath_folder.description: Path to a file on a users computer

protocol_name.description: Protocol name for which imaging experiment conducted.

staining_date.description: Date on which slide staining was processed.

time_point.description: Study related collection time point, as described in the protocol intake form. Example: Progression.
time_point.title: Time Point

lead organization study id.description: Trial identifier used by lead organization, e.g. Center for Experimental Therapeutics Program (CTEP) ID or Industry Sponsored ID.  This is usually a short identifier. Example: E4412.

AR Reagent.description: Heating antigen retrieval reagents for tissue preparation.

AR pH.description: pH levels of reagents from heating antigen retrieval procedure.

Antibody.description: Antibody type collected for this study.

Antibody Company.description: Company from which antibody sample was derived.

Cat#.description: Antibody registry catalog number assigned to antibody sample.

Clone.description: Resulting type of antibody clone from primary antibody sample.

Isotype.description: Antibody isotype used to help differentiate non-specific background signal from specific antibody signal.

Lot#.description: Identification number assigned to the particular quantity or lot of material from manufacturer.

PostPrimary Linker Block.description: Linker block between the antibody and the therapeutic drug.

Pr. Antibody Dilution.description: Concentration ratio of dilution buffer for primary antibody.

Pr. Antibody Incubation Temp.description: Temperature used for primary antibody incubation.

Primary Antibody Block.description: Blocking reagent used for primary antibody sample.

S. Antibody.description: Secondary antibody used to bind to primary antibody for detection assistance.

S. Antibody Dilution.description: Concentration ratio of dilution buffer for secondary antibody prep.

S. Antibody Incubation Time.description: Temperature used for secondary antibody incubation.

S. Cat #.description: Antibody registry catalog number assigned to secondary antibody sample.

S. Company.description: Company from which secondary antibody sample was derived.

S. Lot #.description: Identification number assigned to the particular quantity or lot of secondary antibody material from manufacturer.

Secondary Antibody Block.description: Secondary antibody blocking reagent used for primary sample.

Species.description: Host species from which primary antibody sample was derived.

Staining Order.description: Order in which samples were stained for procedure.

assay creator.description: Indicates what site is filling out the assay.

autostainer model.description: Model version of the autostainer instrument.

cell segmentation model.description: Model used for cell segmentation in an imaging experiment.

image analysis software.description: Source sofware for digital pathology and image analysis.

image analysis software version.description: Source sofware version for digital pathology and image analysis.

lead organization study id.description: Trial identifier used by lead organization, e.g. Center for Experimental Therapeutics Program (CTEP) ID or Industry Sponsored ID.  This is usually a short identifier. Example: E4412.

positive cell detection model.description: Model used for postitive cell detection in imaging experiment.

protocol name.description: Protocol name for which imaging experiment conducted.

slide scanner model.description: Model version of the slide scanner instrument.

staining platform.description: Staining platform used for tissue sample labeling.

title: Metadata file for micsss
